name: QuickDraw (itch)
description:
QuickDraw is a local multiplayer player competitive game that tests you and your friend's reaction time. With the use of a single button, swift hands and a keen eye, you can win a quick game.

The gameplay is very straight forward, you ready up, wait for that high noon, then shoot.

Trailer:

Features:

  • Very simple gameplay
  • Hand drawn art and animations
  • Test you and your friend's reaction time
  • TUMBLEWEEDS

System Requirements

  • Windows XP
  • Intel Core 2 Duo
  • 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX 9.0c Compatible Card
